description.name: wbtcpolygon
description.tagline: Wrapped BTC polygon Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto polygon-wbtc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Wrapped BTC polygon directly on your website
Unique polygon/wbtc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your polygon/wbtc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
